name: Minos (CastGames)
description:
¿Podrás escapar del laberinto antes de que te cace el Minotauro?

Juego desarrollado para la Indie DevJam en Español #4, cuya temática era "solo moverse".

Desarrollado por Óscar Castro (CastGames)

Música de Gunnar Clovis https://soundcloud.com/gunnarclovis

Can you escape the labyrinth before the Minotaur hunts you?

Game developed for the Indie DevJam in Spanish # 4, whose theme was "just move".

Developed by Óscar Castro (CastGames)

Music by Gunnar Clovis  https://soundcloud.com/gunnarclovis
